tips.colors: Browns work well for chocolate treats. Pastries can use yellows, whites, and pinks. Fruity desserts call for reds, purples, and oranges.
tips.techniques: A. Layering Colors: For a chocolate cupcake, start with a brown base. Layer darker browns in the crease areas. Use pinks and whites for frosting on top. B. Textured Effects: Use a cotton ball to dab on white frosting textures. Or make tiny dots with a pencil tip to create sprinkle patterns.
tips.challenge: Color your dessert scene using complementary colors that sit opposite on the color wheel, like purple and yellow. You’ll practice coordinating vivid yet balanced color pairings across the image.

crafts.title: 5 DIY Dessert Crafts
crafts.text: Get ready for some deliciously fun activities with these tempting dessert-themed crafts! Supplies Needed: Instructions: What You’ll Need: Here’s How: Gather These: Steps: You’ll Need: Instructions: Supplies: Let’s Make It!
